id.description: field ID, usually automatically created from key index

prefix.description: prefix to be added to the form field, useful for CSRF and subforms

suffix.description: suffix to form field IDs, to guarantee uniqueness at DOM

type.description: field type, must have a corresponding function render$Type

bind.description: model this field is conected to, accepts relations

alias.description: supports bind from the model side

attributes.description: element attributes, usually class names and data-*

scope.description: scope to be used in references and sub forms

label.description: label, if not set will be build from $.name

choices.description: for select, checkbox and radio types, the acceptable options (method or callback)

choicesFilter.description: filter for the choices, usually based on another property

serialize.description: if the contents should be serialized, and by which serialization method

tooltip.description: additional tooltips to be shown on focus

renderer.description: use another renderer instead of the template, accepts callbacks

filters.description: filters this field choices based on another field's value

logic.description: adds conditional logic to this field

class.description: container class names (attribute value, use spaces for multiple classes)

multiple.description: for select and checkboxes, if accepts multiple values

required.description: if this field is mandatory (raises errors)

html_labels.description: if true, labels and other template contents won't be escaped

size.description: size, in bytes, for the contents of this field, for numeric types use $range

min_size.description: minimum size, in bytes, for the contents of this field, for numeric types use $range

accept.description: content types accepted, used for file uploads

fieldset.description: fieldset label this field belongs to

before.description: content to be displayed before the field

after.description: content to be displayed after the field
